projects.heading: My Recent Works
projects.description: Here are a few projects I've worked on recently.
projects.bloomShare.title: BloomShare
projects.bloomShare.description: A flower delivery service that connects local florists with customers, featuring real-time order tracking and customizable arrangements.
projects.amazon.title: Warehouse Deals
projects.amazon.description: A Telegram bot that tracks and notifies users about Amazon Warehouse deals, helping them find the best discounts.
projects.captchaSolver.title: Captcha Solver
projects.captchaSolver.description: An advanced captcha solving system using machine learning and computer vision techniques.
projects.clientAntiCheat.title: FiveM Anti-Cheat
projects.clientAntiCheat.description: A client-side anti-cheat system for FiveM servers, implementing various detection methods.
projects.moreComing.title: More Coming Soon
projects.moreComing.description: Stay tuned for more exciting projects!
